title: Real, Raw & Ripped Series by Katy Evans
description:
Real
A fallen boxer.
A woman with a broken dream.
A competitionÃ¢â‚¬Â¦
He even makes me forget my name. One night was all it took, and I forgot everything and anything except the sexy fighter in the ring who sets my mind ablaze and my body on fire with wantingÃ¢â‚¬Â¦
Remington Tate is the strongest, most confusing man IÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ve ever met in my life.
HeÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s the star of the dangerous underground fighting circuit, and IÃ¢â‚¬â„¢m drawn to him as IÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ve never been drawn to anything in my life. I forget who I am, what I want, with just one look from him. When heÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s near, I need to remind myself that I am strongÃ¢â‚¬â€œbut he is stronger. And now itÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s my job to keep his body working like a perfect machine, his taut muscles primed and ready to break the bones of his next opponents . . .
But the one heÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s most threatening to, now, is me.
I want him. I want him without fear. Without reservations.
If only I knew for sure what it is that he wants from me?

Mine
In the international bestseller Real, the unstoppable bad boy of the Underground fighting circuit finally met his match. Hired to keep him in prime condition, Brooke Dumas unleashed a primal desire in Remington "Remy" Tate as vital as the air he breathesÃ¢â‚¬Â¦and now he canÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t live without her.
Brooke never imagined she would end up with the man who is every womanÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s dream, but not all dreams end happily ever after, and just when Remington needs her the most, Brooke makes a discovery that forces her away from the ringside. Now with distance and darkness between them, the only thing left is to fight for the love of the man she calls Mine.
